values: Locked.

Love this picture! :DD


The girls with Josh.

I've just received my fav Starbucks latte and Frolick yogurt! Other then the fact that i'm still pretty much sick, tonight's kinda awesome. Moreover, Iris is replacing me tomorrow (Thanks babe! :DD), which means i could use the time tomorrow to rest. Okayy, time for bed, feeling groggy after taking the medication. Goodnight ya'll!

XOXO.

So i just got back from the doctor and apparently i'm down with a VERY VERY VERY VERY BAD FLU. I'm given 2 days mc, and if by friday i'm still not well, the mc is extended to Sunday. I should get well by then, if not its pretty serious and i gotta go back for review. I stumbled to the doctor in the most unglam state that you'll ever see me in. I was make-up-less, in the sloppiest outfit ever and i had my pouch on one hand, a tissue box in the other. Yes you heard it, tissue box. Its not even those packet/travelling kind, its those boxes you have at home. And by the time i finished seeing the doctor, i went home with an empty box! 

The worst news of all i weighed myself at the clinic and I LOST ANOTHER FREAKING 2 KG! That makes me 44Kg now. Mind you, just last year during my O levels, i was 52Kg. Omgosh, a total weight lost of 8Kg which is pretty unbelievable. For once, i am extremely sad about it because its taking a toll on my health. Plus plus, i can't fit into alot of my clothing because they're either too huge or too beggy which makes it really ugly, especially if you're talking about jeans/pants. 

Note to self, I MUST GET WELL BY SUNDAY! Please pray for me guys, i really can't afford to fall sick at this point of time. I'm literally fighting to stay alive just to get my assignments done. By praise the Lord, i just received an sms from Eve regarding my 4 articles that i've just handed in. I've received 4/5, individually for all 4 articles! Thats kinda amazing. 

Oh yes, and my apologies if there's any spelling/grammer mistakes. I just took a whole lot of medication that will cause drowsiness so actually in a few mins time, i'll prolly concuss on my bed or something. My motor skills are really screwed up right now. 

**Twin, i just wanna thank you for being there. I really didn't know who to cry to and i'm so sorry if i've gotten you involved in this whole saga. 
**R and S, just wanna say that you 2 are the best. Without you guys now, i'll probably die or something. (: Love you tons! 

**And to you, if you're reading this (which i know you would), i really hope you'll wake up and know that there are people around who still care. I am one of them.

I had trouble sleeping, particularly last night. Infact i didn't fall asleep until 6 in the morning and even though i did managed to get some sleep, i finally decided to get up 10am. I feel absolutely terrible. For the past few days, i haven been eating much, sleep was also a problem. I had to juggle between work and school, at the same time, trying to rush through my assignments. Thank God at least i managed to clear 4 articles and the quiz. Now, i'm only left with my final group project, which i'm so not looking forward to. 

I think i've just lost alot of weight, AGAIN. In a few days time, if my fever and flu still persists, i'll prolly be in the hospital or something. Yes, its that bad. 

And i'm sorry to you, you, you and you. I did not choose you over them. That's the truth. Period.

HAPPY BELATED BIRTHDAY PST KONG!
The best pastor/mentor/father that a church could ever have. (:

Anyway, service was great! We had the SOT grad svc and congrats to all! Throughout the whole svc, God was speaking to me about going to SOT next year. And i'm still praying about it but there are already so many 'signs' or what you call, confirmation, for me. One of it is that i'll be graduating with my specialist diploma in Psychology in the beginning of March 2009 and coincidentally, SOT begins on the 30th of March! The timing is as though it has been perfectly planned out for me.

In any case, i'll continue to seek the Lord about this. I'm just so excited bout the future!!

((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((:

Excessive sneezing and sore throat sucks.
And when time isn't on your side, it doesn't make things any better. SHEESH!

Alright, so here are the photos for filming part 2.

We had to do the running after Ben and Gurmit scene in the carpark because it was pouring outside. Director Philip joined us in the scene please. Damn hilarious!





The Girls. (:



By the way, the girl on the extreme left is Pierre Png's cousin! Her name is Shen-rae (if i didn't remember wrongly).

While we were waiting for the cars to arrive to take us to another location.





Benjamin aka 'HAMSOME'. He's like one head taller then me seriously!





I was telling thinkaliker that his face is super rubbery and comical lah! I couldn't stop laughing!



On set.

PRIS!





Super practical, down to earth, friendly, loving actress that i've ever met. We were talking non stop la seriously! And she gave us tons of insights about mediacorp, channel 8 and even the chinese show that she's currently filming (Yes the one that she acted as 'Erbo' the vietnamnese women. There's gonna be a season 2 and she kinda told us a lil bit of the story).



As quoted by Mas, 'The 6 princesses of Calefare show'.



Mas and yours truly. Awesome character! Before she left, she even came to shake our hands and said goodbye. Totally humble please.



We were waiting for the volleyball scene.



Yes yes, what you guys have all been waiting for, the sizzling hot Fiona Xie. She's super hyper and loud off set, when we're having our breaks and stuff. And definitely addicted to her mini Sudoku book that she carries around all the time.



The crew.





Pris and her volleyball scene. Not easy okay.







This is Wenn, one of the wonderful producers.



TRACY! Pris called her 'Fee-li-fair-leh' because of her english. HAHA.





KHAI, THE FUNNIEST ASSISTANT DIRECTOR EVER!





And finally the person whom the whole crew will collapse without, WILLIAM!





Seriously, he is the guy who is running around like crazy behind the scenes to make things happen, get us food and drinks, make sure that the set is okay, shelter us from the rain. Basically the first to reach and the last to get home kind. KUDOS TO YOU!

Was just talking to Khai yesterday, we're gonna arrange a Calefare outing for all the cast and crew soon! (:

BUT BUT, with that much success and fun comes with consequences. I'm down with fever and sore throat now. Because i've only been able to get 2 to 3 hours of sleep everyday and i haven been eating well also. And i think i caught a cold while filming that day. It was raining like crazy, the winds were strong, we were freezing in our beach wear and had no jackets. We even resulted in using an umbrella as our jackets la!

I'm really thankful to God for giving me this opportunity despite all these. I hope this is just the beginning. (:

To Sandy, if you ever get to ready this, i just wanna say thank you babe! (: And to those who only lend a helping hand to others if it benefits you, wake up, and get a life.

Anyway, sorry for the delay of the photos. I really haven got the time to upload it onto photobucket. Takes really long to load and stuff. I promise it'll be up by friday the latest! I know you readers are dying to see the sizzling hot Fiona Xie and flawless Priscelia (thats how her name it spelt). Please watch Episode 9 of Calefare. FYI, its episode 2 this week. So there's 7 more weeks to go. Its the beach scene!

Note to self:
1. Get at least 8 hours of sleep for the next few days.
2. Have regular meals and nutritious food.
3. Chiong assignments.
4. Upload photos.
5. REST as much as possible.
6. Stop pushing my body to the limit.

Had filming yesterday again. I woke up at 5am and had to rush down to Sentosa by 7.30am. And guess what, by the time i got there, it poured like nobody's business! The producers were driving us around to different locations in Sentosa where there's shelter, just to film. Kudos to them.

We had filming from 7.30am to 6.45pm. Can you imagine how tired we were. 
Please pray for me, i'm not feeling well.

Ps: Pictures will be up soon.

XOXO.

I survived today by the grace of God! (: Struggled to wake up though. Choir was awesome! Its been a long time since i last served due to the exams, school and work. BUT I'M BACK ON STAGE BABY!

Anyhoos, i've gotta get up by 7.30am tomorrow (being a Sunday, i should still be in bed)! Doing opening with Geri at GWC till 2.30pm. Got 30mins to spare, was thinking of dropping by a salon for wash and blow before i make my way down to Habourfront to meet up with Twin. Shoot's at 4pm and hopefully it wouldn't be so hot by then. Don't wanna get sunburn and whatnots.

Omg, i just received a sms from Wenn. Shoot starts at 11am tomorrow, till 7pm. Just-kill-me-now!
I AM EXTREMELY TIRED TO THE MAXIMUM (TIMES TEN)!

Okay, so thank God for the opportunity! I had fun yesterday although by the time i got home, i wanted to just lie on the floor and do nothing. Yes, not even bathing. But i did lah! Now, for the pictures. Now, i've got 4 assignments to complete by wed! CHIONG ARHH!

PCD's new MTV. One word, HOT! Especially from 2mins 48 seconds onwards.

<lj-embed id="30"/>

Woke up at 5am this morning and i only managed to get 2 hours of sleep this afternoon before i had to rush down for filming at Sentosa. In the end, Wenn informed me 5 mins before the shoot, that it was cancelled. -.-! So we wenta Vivo, walked around, tried tons of dresses, finally got one from Zara. And then we wenta Toys R Us. Unglam to the max i know! HAHAH. Tomorrow's gonna be a looonnnggg day as well. Will be in church from 2pm to 6pm, then i've gotta rush down to Gwc for my shift till 10.15pm. As for Sunday, i'll be doing opening at Gwc till 2.30pm, Iris will be coming in thereafter, then i've to go for a shoot again at 4pm. PLUS, i've got 4 assignments due by Wed. Honestly, i don't know how i'm gonna get all these done. SSSSTTTRRRREEEETTTCCCHHHHH MMMEEEEE GGGGOOOOODDDD!

I don't know what's going on or what have i done. Haven been sleeping much since Sunday and i've been pushing my body to the limit. Went for Serene's grandfather's funeral wake yesterday. Reached home at 1am or so, slept at 4am and i was suppose to get up by 5am to go down to Jw for prayer meeting. I overslept and now here i am at work.

God, please give me a solution.
I'm going into the prayer closet and never coming out.

I was just going through some of my older folders. Lo and behold i found these fat and hideous pictures of myself! Yes yes, laugh all you want.


Sec 1 braces days. UNBELIEVABLE! (And yes, thats twin)


This is in the year 2006 i think. FAT DAYS! Just take a look at my fat arm!


Still kinda fat and make-up less. GEE.


Now for the slimmer and more improved self.


This is just the beginning. Still make-up less though.


With make up and slightly coloured hair.


When hours spent in the gym has paid off. TA-DAA!
From a UK size 10 to UK size 4-6 now!

There are still more drastic pictures. Ask me lah, then i'll show you. Obviously i'm not gonna upload it here.

"It would have been different with someone else, just not with you."
















How would that feel?

I cannot emphasize enough how awesome this morning's prayer meeting @ Jw was! (: Although i had to wake up at 5am this morning because prayer meeting starts at 7am, i gladly did. Infact, i only had 2 hours of sleep. I wenta bed at 3am. I know, this is insane. While praying this morning, the power of God and his supernatural strength was upon me. I could feel his love saturating the hall and the sight of the 2500 people praying altogether in the morning is amazing! The whole hall was packed, even the stairs were filled! It was good, very very good! And i felt very refreshed after the whole thing ended. If you guys have the opportunity to go, please do.

Anyway, i know i haven been updating much. I promise i'll do a proper update bout National Day soon, with pictures! (:

XOXO.

I've decided to lock up 50% of the post because i've realized that people in this world has everything and anything to comment about. Even if it is non of their business. Anyway, today has been a mentally draining, physically exhausting and emotionally tormenting day! It also doesn't get any better if someone close to you doesn't accept the way you judge or get things done. Other then the fact that D got me my Shu Uemura Deepsea Facial Mist (it did help cheer me up a lil), i wished that i didn't exist today. Yes, its that bad. And i only had 2 hours of sleep the previous night.

You know i might just end up re-creating a whole new URL for my blog. We'll see.....

Work with Calynne yesterday was fun! You'll never guess what we did. We went into Chanel, YSL, Balenciaga and Versace's website, browsed through every item and drool over it. HAHA! But we were not skiving okay, in fact sales was not bad. LOL!! I'm so jealous of Ben please, he just got himself a YSL bag at 50% discount. But still not very cheap lah, $1500 can! And Calynne was eyeing on a bag from YSL too. We were saying that if we ever splurge on a bag that costs so much, we'll have to starve for 3 months or so.

I was browsing through Versace's night gowns and stuff. Damn pretty la! If you guys haven seen the latest designs, you ought to shoot yourself. They have one of the best designs around and the materials used adds the extra bang to it.

Anyway, today's class was mind boggling. I couldn't catch majority of what the lecturer was talking about and i didn't understand. In retrospect, i didn't learn much and i'm starting to worry bout the exams. GEE, we had a quiz today and the questions were so difficult to understand. Everyone was struggling to just get the basics please. Argh!

And its not as if tomorrow's class would be any better.

OMG OMG OMG! I've just received an email from ********* regarding something! (: I'm super excited for what's about to happen! But i'll not reveal anything until they get back to me and if everything's confirmed. So stay tune for more updates.

Wenta NATAS Fair yesterday with the mother and i'm leaving for Korea in December!!! In fact, i'll be spending Christmas in one of Korea's best Ski lodge. Its gonna be freezing like crazy though and i'm gonna miss my awesome-ly crazy friends who spends Christmas with me every year without fail. Other then that, i have no qualms bout leaving Singapore. HAHAHA! I kinda had enough of this hectic lifestyle and i need a break. This whole week has been a mad rush literally. Been rushing from one place to another.

Laveen was my life saver yesterday! He came all the way to SIS to pass me the keys for opening! (: Thanks bro! It saved me a whole lot of trouble. If not i would have had to go all the way down to Tess's place at Chua Chu Kang, just to get it from her. Can you imagine?! Its like i would be going from the east, to the north(?) and back to SIS to meet up with my people and then back to my place which is north east. -.-!

Reached home at 2.45am this morning. Had supper with the gang and they came over to my place to visit (in my opinion), the world's cutest dog. LOL! By the time i hit the sheets, it was 4am! And i'm currently in the store, which means i did opening this morning. 4 hours of sleep is no joke okay. Moreover, i'll be working till closing today because i'll be replacing Deb.T. ):

Anyway, pls keep me in your prayers cause i'm stuggling to survive the whole of next week, all the way until the 12th of Aug.
Just obnoxiously-rude. Anyway whatever it is, you do not raise your voice at anyone in public. Its just a reflection of yourself!

So i've been working very very hard this week. To the point whereby i'm not even aware that i'm actually down with flu. ): Wenta work at EH today and halfway through my shift, Lillian suggested that i go home and rest. HEY, first time i got chase home for working too hard. Lol. Anyhoos, i've got so much to settle! 2 bdays coming up and i've to get the gifts and stuff.

Btw.....did i mention i got my BVLGARI RING! Okay, my uncle gave it to me. Hahas. For some reason i can't upload the picture so here's a peek at it from some random website. http://www.juraice.com/bzero-1ring11.jpg
Apparently its $1.3k! OMG right, i'm afraid that i'll lose it or something.

Alright, i needa run. Gotta get my stuff done!

VERY, VERY VERY TIRED! I've been working 3 consecutive days in a row and its no joke okay. At the end of the day, i'll be so sleepy BUT when its time for me to sleep, i'll just toss and turn in bed, wake up every 2 hours or so. MUST AS WELL DON'T SLEEP LOH! And i've been having nightmares. The scary thing is, the nightmares are quite similar! The other night i had the dream and i couldn't take it more, so i got up to pray. My eye bags are so bad now that even concealer doesn't work. ):

I'm starting to fall sick too. Having a lil cough and all. I need rest!

I spent like a bomb today. Got my mani and padi done! (: Bought boots, earrings and a pair of slippers because i didn't have the intention to do my padi. It was a last minute decision. 

Other then the fact that i'm super hungry to the max now (i only had bread for lunch and crispy chicken for dinner, damn unhealthy i know) and sleepy, i'm quite happy today.

EXAMS ARE OFFICIALLY OVER!!

So i think i deserve at least an 'A' grade for the exam today. I studied really really hard and put in alot of effort when i was summarizing everything from the textbook and making my own notes. So much so that i didn't get much sleep ytd cause i was afraid if i really went into deep sleep, i would forget everything. Hahas! 

Was talking to Chris and he said that i should reward myself by eating chocolates. -.-! Mr listener, i could have chocolates everyday lah. No need to wait till i am extremely confident for my papers then i can help myself to them right? 

So i'm gonna meet Eve tmr and we'll be going to get our nails done! (: Extremely excited and i'll finally be at GWC tomorrow. Shar's not well so i'll be replacing her.

I'm thinking of low lights for my hair. What say you? I know the last time i coloured my hair was in May but i'm sick of the colour already. Very very dark purplish black or blue-ish black? Ahhh, so many things i wanna do. 

Actually, i should be saving up for the big project and not spending like nobody's business. Sheesh!

OMG, have you guys seen Nelly's new MTV feat Fergie? Its makes me wanna get up on my feet and dance! And the song's been ringing in my mind this whole time!

Just walked through the door, what's it gonna be?
I can't get to the floor, boys all over me.
Where my party, p-party party, p-party people at?

And i think Fergie's hot. Although no doubt she went through some plastic surgery, but who cares man, the outcome is that she looks better la! I'm so not against plastic surgery. I mean if you have the money, why not? Its not as if by reconstructing your face or body will make you a different person on the inside. There's nothing negative about it. I don't see why the media is so not over celebs going through plastic surgery. Bring this closer to home, i bet if i were to go for some plastic surgery to reconstruct some part of me now, my friends who are 'against' this will be bitching away and stuff. My point is, people are just bring sour over the fact that others have the money to make themselves look better and that they don't. Get a life man!

Anyway, that aside. I'm very very happy (times ten!) that my group is done with our final project. Now all i needa do is to concentrate on my exams and do well! Please keep me in your prayers. (:

Note to self: Get my nails done after the exams.

I would like to thank the people who stood in for me while i had to take time off to study. 

Theresa:
First and foremost, you're possibly the only person who really understands how frustrating it is for people not to reply your email/smses/phone calls. It irritates the hell out of me cause it only goes to show that people in the world, including your friends, are very very selfish. But anyway, THANKS BABE. Although i know your schedule is packed to the max, yet you used your free time inbetween and replaced me! I am very thankful for you! (: 
PS: Mani and Padi session after my exams?

Ben:
I love working with you cause we'll haven never ending gossip sessions about anything and everything under the sun! And whenever i'm looking for replacements, you'll always be there, ever ready to help. Thanks for everything! Especially teaching me some of the 'tricks' to the things around. HAHA! You're the best!

And to the rest of the people, Carmen, Laveen, Iris, Eugene, Jon, Yu xuan. I love you guys and thanks a million!

XOXO.
I'm about to go crazy. Assignments are killing me, i've no time to study for the exams which are next week. And its not helping if your colleagues are not replying your smses and email!

Okay. So i've been really BUSY!!!! The last time i blogged was like 4 days ago! Which only explains why you guys haven been seeing me online as well. QI JI MAN! Cause i'm known for always being online, even if i were outside or something, i'll always be logged in on MSN, until its time for bed then my computer will be off. Hahas.

Anyway...... PLT!! I just got back both of my assignments and i've received high distinctions for both!! This is amazing! (: Since i've started school, i've given myself no excuse to not do well. As much as possible, i'mma try to get B grades and above for everything. I've been working hard okay!

Presetation last week came as a shock. Nobody was prepared, but at least my group managed to scrape whatever we have and just present it. So it wasn't too bad. Now that presentation is done, i'm only left with Fred's assignment (that is due on TUE!! OMFG, i've not started on a single thing). And just needa fine tune Siva's assignment, then i'm done with all the projects. Exams are in 8 days and honestly, i've not started studying. I-AM-SO-DEAD!

HOW NOW BROWN COW?

Guess what, MY UNCLE ENDED UP PAYING FOR MY WALLET AND I DIDN'T HAVE TO FORK OUT A SINGLE CENT! (:
Oh but please pray for me, i've been having this very bad headache for 3 days in a row. If the pain persists till Friday, i'll prolly go see the doctor. Thank God i'm done with Siva's 2nd assignment though, i'll prolly go bang my head on the wall if i had no time to do it.









Its time to rest now.

Remember i mentioned that i wanted to get the Kate spade wallet/clutch bag or the Gucci one? Now i've changed my mind and decided to go for....................MARC JACOBS!!!! ((((((((((((: I know i'm spoilt. But its not that i demanded to get it, my beloved uncle decided to sponser me a 100 bucks to get whatever wallet i wanted. And he said that since i have a Gucci already, why do i wanna get back the same brand. Plus Kate spade is nice but when compared to Marc Jacobs, common sense would tell you that Marc Jacobs is better la! HAHA!! 

SO, i'll be going down to collect my fantastic wallet tomorrow! I CAN'T WAIT! Wa lao, i swear my ego was damn high while i was hopping from one store to another. I better not get into the details before i start getting nasty comments and everything. I went to Ferragamo and i actually quite like the wallets but Mom was saying that Ferragamo isn't me. And i'm still contemplating whether i should get my shades from Gucci or Marc Jacobs. What say you?

Kayy, i better turn in soon. Doing opening tomorrow which means i've to get up early. ):

XOXO.

OMFG! This video that you're about to watch is superbly sexy and a lil steamy, so kids, please click on the X on the top right hand corner of the page. HAHAS! Okay, jokes aside. Seriously, you guys should watch it man cause when you put Robert Hoffman (the sexiest guy in my opinion because he's such an awesome dancer plus he's charming) and Enrique Iglesias together, equals to sex-bombs please! Especially the part where that lucky women was touching Robert Hoffman's washboard abs! Now i sound like some pervertic sicko. LOLS!

JUUUSSTTT KIIILLLL MMMEEEEE NNOOOOWWWWW. (:

My life is pathetic, really. It basically revolves around school, work and church. Other then that, i seldom have the time to go catch a movie, or maybe just a date with my girlfriends. And while i'm typing this entry, i'm freezing my ass off at work. Yes, i've to work on Sundays, which suck by the way. Plus, i haven had my breakfast (!@#$%^&*) i'm like crazily hungry can. People ask why am i losing weight rapidly. My answer to you is that i only have one meal a day most of the time (not healthy, do not try this), and its taking a toll on my body. And i'll be at Marina from 10pm-1am tonight to help with the shifting and stuff. GEE, talk about having a life. 

In addition, tomorrow is the only day where i could really get rest and stuff. But no, i had to sacrifice the time to meet up with my group mates to get our project done on Evolution Psychology. My gawd, i needa take a break, sit back and just relax. You know, i'm even contemplating on getting my degree in Australia instead of Singapore next year, just for a change in environment. 8 more months till i'm done with this Specialist Diploma. Pfffttttt. Then again, it has its pros and cons.

Planning for a trip at the end of this year. I seriously need one. Was thinking of going back to the states. My last trip there was 7 years ago. Or maybe Japan. Europe will be fantastic actually. We'll see how it goes, Mom would prolly go for Japan which is actually last on my list.

Back to work.

I think i'm starting to abandon my blog. I need to get back on track with the whole blogging thing but i guess its just not working out. HAHA! Kayy kayy, that aside, i got myself this baby:



i'M IN LOVE WITH IT! But still kinda in the process of getting use to the whole touch screen thing. SHEESH.

Today's the day, where random thoughts just zoom in and out of my head. I won't say i'm feeling all emo now but i've the nostalgic sensation.
Don't you guys have days or events that happened in your life that you'll never forget? I'm sure everyone does lah.

So first up, i miss secondary school days ALOT! I miss my classmates, times whereby we were late for class and we had to come up with lame excuses, when we got sent out of class and yet we would stand along the corridoor yaking away, chionging down for recess because we were afraid that that there were not enough seats, laughing and making fun of the teachers.


First period of the day, which explains why my expression was such.


During Biology lesson. I got bored. HAHA!


We took this picture secretly during Hou lao shi's lesson. LOL.


On the way for our CIP at Chinatown.


We were such slackers. Mind you, we were suppose to be having CCA.


Some field trip.


And the good times that we've shared.


Spiderman (NOT).


Miss Ho's farewell lunch at Marche with the class.


Group pic.


Xuan's farewell dinner before she left for Australia.


Our signature twist for the class. (Inside joke!)


Secondly, Talent time 2006- where bonds were fostered like never before.












And lastly, the bunch of people who went through Heaven/hell with me and emerged.


Bestie twin!


Mian bao chao ren.


My favourite boys.


Chris Long, the one who forced me into playing Para para for the first time in my life.


Johnny, the walking joke book! 


Mr officer.


Theresa Yee, my gossip partner.


Every single person in this picture plays an important part of my life.



I'm basically thankful to God for placing them in my life. (:

XOXO.

Brother's birthday bash. (The rest of the photos are up on flickr)









Kungfu Panda Day.





Girlfriends are ZEE-BEST! <3


Do you know where the end is?
Do you think you can see it?
Well, until you get there, go on, go ahead and scream it
Just say, "All I need, is the air I breathe, and a place, to rest my head."

Insanely busy to the max! I mean like i only started on Fred's assignment on Monday, the amazing thing was its due on the next day which is Tuesday. But thank God i managed to finish it in time! (: I had broken sleep yesterday, it must be because of the latte that i drank during class. 

You know what, i'm just gonna go get some rest now. I've lost my blogging mojo.

I'm sick of having to be the one who initiates everything before things can be done or settled. I don't like to have to tell you that i need this or that. I mean like somethings are common sense although it differs and depending on the situation. I'm not being unreasonable here because if you think of it, this past week has sucked so far and to make things worst, i'm down with fever now PLUS i have to work tomorrow. Of course i do have a choice and could go get an MC from the doctor but i've decided that i'm gonna work despite the fact that my head's burning. Even if it kills me, i would still do it just to prove my point that there are things in life that is worth sacrificing for and you need/must make the decision to sacrifice when necessary. Its all about time management, the 'give and take' theory.

If it makes you happier that i might just collapse out of exhaustion (and not as if i've been eating well to get all the nutrients and energy that i need), then good for you cause your wish just MIGHT come true.

And common sense would tell you that if someone close to you is on the verge of dying, you wouldn't still have a time of your life, having dinner outside right?! Who would be such a faggot!?

Lastly, i've another freaking 1000 word essay to complete by Tuesday. THIS IS SO NOT FUNNY RIGHT NOW CAUSE I SWEAR I COULD JUST STAB SOMEONE A THOUSAND TIMES AND NOT HAVE ANY GUILT OR FEEL REMORSEFUL AT ALL!

So, scram and get a life!

So the party was a success! Especially the fashion show. (: I'll upload the pictures tomorrow, too tired to do it now. Did all the planning till 3am ytd.

I'm developing a sore throat soon. I can feel it cause its starting to hurt. Anyway, i'm so looking forward to next sat! 
OMGOMG.
